data.message:
I named this rap... I'm sorry!!!  Please read... I wrote this to immortal techniques "dance with the devil" 

Yo...

Ive treated my family evilly, I'm sorry for showing you the evil me, I'm sorry for being an asshole and not treating you equally, I'm sorry for not taking your advice and not letting you teach me, I'm sorry for abusing you freely, I'm sorry my life didn't pan out evenly... but I will eventually fix my mistakes and stop all this anger and hate, why did I turn out this way? For fucks sake I'm sorry for being a dickhead, I'm sorry for stealing all the food so there's nothing for the kids left, I'm sorry for eating the last two slices of white bread, I'm sorry I've tried to make my life dead, I'm sorry I never made my own bed, I'm sorry for all the nasty shit I may have said, I'm sorry I never payed my own rent, I'm sorry for racking up so many drug debts... I'm sorry for acting like a thug, I'm sorry for showing no love, I'm sorry for being an asshole brother and son, I'm sorry to my dad and mum for acting like a loaded gun, I'm sorry for having no fun, it's been a tough run but I shouldn't take my shit out on no one... especially when all you do is care, I'm sorry for making you rip out your hair, I'm sorry for giving you the evil stare, I'm sorry for acting like a villain in an evil lair, I'm sorry for trying to act all high and mighty barking orders from a chair, I'm sorry for cleaning out the bank accounts making them bare... I'm sorry for causing havoc and being so fucking dramatic, I'm sorry for being a drug addict and having nasty habits, I'm sorry for going through the medicine cabinet and stealing dads tablets... I'm sorry I'm not a living success, I'm sorry for being a total mother fucking mess, I'm sorry for not doing my very best, I think I need to evaluate, go to church and get blessed, I'm sorry for inhaling weed into my chest, I'm sorry I've never been straight forward instead I decide to lie and not confess... I'm sorry for being a real pain in the arse, I'm sorry the times gone so fast, I'm sorry for setting you a difficult task, I'm sorry for ripping out your hearts, I'm sorry I can't make use laugh, I'm sorry I keep bringing up the past, I'm sorry for not making the joy last... I'm sorry for causing so much pain and harm, I'm sorry I can't stay calm, maybe I should start reading psalms, I'm sorry I don't own a home on a big farm, I'm sorry for acting like a biserk soldier in Vietnam dropping napalm, I'm sorry for being fake mum, I'm sorry for not keeping tranquil like a day spa, I'm sorry for tearing house's apart, I'm sorry for getting your hopes up hoping that one day I'll make a great start... I'm sorry for throwing punches and eating the kids lunches, I'm sorry for disobeying punishments, I'm sorry I spent all your hundreds... I'm sorry for flapping my gums when I shouldn't, I'm sorry for saying I'll be good when really I couldn't... See I'm hurting deep, my life's up shits creek and it's really fucking killing me, I've been asked to leave that many times please believe me and see what I see, I'm sorry I ate all the cake including the icing, I'm sorry I'm not exciting and enthusiastic about my lifey... I'm sorry if I might sound depressing but this how I deal with my demons, I'm sorry I can't produce nephews or niece's because I only care about myself but really I'm falling in pieces... I'm sorry for being a jigsaw puzzle, I'm sorry for going against god's will causing trouble, I'm sorry for having a split personality like some kind of body double, I'm sorry for not showing that I love you... I'm lost and insecure, I wish I could find myself but why try when there's no cure, I'm sorry I never tried to stay healthy and pure, I'm sorry for not being nice to ya...I'm sorry for blaming you for all of my problems when I'm the only one to blame, I feel restricted like a convict wearing a ball and chain, I'm sorry my routine remains the same, I'm sorry for fucking up the family name, I'm sorry for pissing my life down the drain, I'm sorry for drawing blood and inflicting pain, I'm sorry for being a mental and physical strain... I've almost taken flight like United Airlines but one last thing... I'm sorry for everything!!!

replies.message:
It would be dope if you weren't so sorry.

Just being real.

Keep practicing, you'll get there.
